about.title: About me
about.p1: Software Developer with over seven years of experience in designing and implementing backend architectures and data-driven solutions. Specialized in Python, Java, and TypeScript, I transform large volumes of information into clear insights to drive strategic decisions.
about.p2: My strength lies in collaborative environments: I combine technical leadership and analytical vision to tackle complex challenges and generate high impact.
about.p3: As an entrepreneur, I co-founded Conectándote (https://conectandote.com.uy/), a leading platform in Uruguay that connects students with educational opportunities; and, through my blog @Data For Everyone, I share best practices and learnings in Data Science.
